title: Jeffrey Barros Peña
summary: I am a determined recent graduate who is passionate about the field of computer science and the development of software that betters the lives of its users. I look forward to excelling past the boundaries of my academic experience to continue learning about new technology stacks that make up the business world we live in.
jobSearch: Actively seeking full-time software engineering positions

roles.title: Lead Student Technology Specialist
tasks: - Manage a staff of 45+ student technicians to help empower the provision of superior customer service
- Bring tech support to the BC community as Walk-In Help Desk student manager and senior student technician
- Review and enforce policies, particularly those pertaining to quality assurance
- Identify areas for improvement and make policy recommendations as appropriate

roles.title: Student Technology Specialist
tasks: - Reimaged Macs and PCs, installed Bootcamp on Macs, replaced hard drives, ran hard drive and RAM tests
- Offered the Boston College student community technical support emphasizing customer service and professionalism

roles.title: Work-Study Intern
tasks: - Provide support at the internal ITS office and the Walk-In Help Desk
- Route calls for the Boston College Switchboard

roles.title: Software Engineer
tasks: - Front-end web development on a portal to manage incoming food orders (React, PostgreSQL)
- Worked directly with the CTO on the design, structure, and routing of upcoming features
- Agile environment with version control, code reviews, server-side and backend maintenance, UI enhancements

roles.title: Foundations Orientation Mentor
tasks: - Assisted staff in teaching workplace fundamentals that ensured a smooth work-study transition for incoming students

experiences.companyName: Massachusetts House of Representatives, Joint Committee on Public Health

roles.title: Intern, Office of Former State Representative Jeffrey Sánchez
tasks: - Managed a team of 5 interns in assigned tasks that included receiving calls and letters from constituents of the 15th Suffolk/Norfolk District and assisting in the organization of community events, fundraisers, and forums
